messages.subject: Interviews
messages.msgSnippet: Todau, I was interviewd on Glenn Busby s NPR show The Best of Our Knowledge (Glenn is based in Albany, New York).  Don t know when it will be aired, though.
messages.messageBody:
Todau, I was interviewd on Glenn Busby's NPR show "The Best of Our Knowledge" (Glenn is based in Albany, New York). Don't know when it will be aired, though.

Also, on Tuesday, Dan Skinner interviewed me live on WBAA, the NPR affiliate in Indiana -- did anyone hear it? (I'm wondering how it came over?)

david

--
"And the Skylark Sings with Me" is to homeschooling what Tom Paine's "Common Sense" was to the American Revolution."--Greg Bates, Common Courage Press. To read a sample chapter or the foreword,
and to get information about ordering a signed copy, visit www.skylarksings.com or send an e-mail to shantinik@...
